metadata.title: CVE-2016-2175 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Apache PDFBox before 1.8.12 and 2.x before 2.0.1 does not properly initialize the XML parsers, which allows context-dependent attackers to conduct XML External Entity (XXE) attacks via a crafted PDF.

criterions.comment: libpdfbox-java package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.8.12-1').
